name: DiceSurvivor
description:
Roll dice at your enemies to try to survive as long as possible. 

If you get a high score comment a screenshot and I'll add it to the High Scores.

 This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - itch.io.

The theme was Roll of the Dice.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

LMB to throw Dice.

P to pause.

Made By 

Game Design, Programming, Art

Jamie Carmichael

Sound Effects and Music from

Zapsplat.com
